name: Spicy Shrimp Tortilla Soup with Zucchini Noodles
author: bd.weld
summary: This shrimp soup comes together quickly and will warm your insides with spicy red pepper, diced tomatoes, and zucchini noodles. Top with your favorite taco toppings, like prepared tortilla strips, freshly chopped cilantro, lime wedges, diced avocado, sour cream, and crushed red pepper for additional heat.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Cut zucchini in half, then make a cut lengthwise on both sides about 1/4-inch deep
Cut into small noodles using a spiralizer
Combine tomatoes, broth, chili powder, red pepper flakes, oregano, and black pepper in a large saucepan over medium-high heat
Bring soup to a simmer, reduce heat, and cook for 15 minutes
Add shrimp and desired amount of zucchini
Simmer until shrimp is pink, 3 to 5 minutes
